attributes.action: Seize all assets of illegal migrants and deport them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have 500,000 illegal immigrants and 400,000 failed asylum cheats still in the UK. Nothing is being done about this situation where 1 in 60 of our population is illegal. I suggest a radical plan making illegal migration not pay by seizing all the migrants assets and deporting them. If they won't say where they are from then they should be imprisoned for life and fed just gruel.
